tool.name: Fbat
tool.description: Family data association models and tests
tool.help:
**Syntax**
- **Genotype file** is the input family data chosen from available library fbat style pedigree genotype files - **Phenotype file** is the input phenotype file with iid and famid followed by phenotypes - **Dependant variable** is the term on the left of the model
**Summary**
This tool will create and test fbat models of SNP predicting a dependent phenotype variable. A score test is constructed using the transmitted and untransmitted alleles so data comes from pedigrees of relateds
If you don't see the genotype or phenotype data set you want here, it can be imported using one of the methods available from the Galaxy Get Data tool page.
